title: DeFi Security
longDescription: DeFi protocols pose unique security challenges. These measures will help you navigate DeFi more safely.

items.title: Smart contract audits
items.description: Check for smart contract audits before investing
items.details: Only interact with DeFi protocols that have undergone thorough security audits by reputable firms.

items.title: Contract verification
items.details: Always verify the smart contract addresses you're interacting with to avoid phishing attacks and fake protocols.

items.title: Transaction simulation
items.details: Utilize tools that simulate transactions before execution to understand the outcomes and potential risks.
